site_title: Alliance for Cancer Care Equity (ACCE) | Advancing Equity in Cancer Care
description: The Alliance for Cancer Care Equity (ACCE) is a registered charity dedicated to promoting equity in cancer care from prevention through survivorship for all, regardless of financial status. We provide patient support, fund research, and partner with hospitals in Canada and Ghana.
author: Alliance for Cancer Care Equity

images.description: Screenshot of the Alliance for Cancer Care Equity website
